thread.title: Macaroni and cheese on Long Island: Versions we love
thread.title_full: Macaroni and cheese on Long Island: Versions we love | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Macaroni and cheese on Long Island: Versions we love
text:
Grey Horse Tavern in Bayport and more Long Island restaurants serving great mac and cheese. (Credit: Daniel Brennan)
When cheese meets pasta, beautiful things can happen. And while some restaurants keep their macaroni and cheese dishes perfectly simple, others excel at versions that add everything from bacon to duck to lobster.
All of these recommended mac-and-cheeses are worth the calories. We promise.
Selections by Newsday's food staff....
